title: GP IT Futures framework
description: There are two types of Catalogue Solution on the GP IT Futures framework. You can choose to view all those available or only the ones which have all 6 Foundation Capabilities - the minimum requirement to enable a GP practice to operate.
foundationPromoDescription: Find Catalogue Solutions that meet all Foundation Capabilities
allPromoDescription: Find Catalogue Solutions with the Capabilities to meet your needs
comparePromoDescription: Get an overview of all the Catalogue Solutions available and filter them by the Capabilities they offer
